Story Name: Airbnb revenue node and main connection
Notes: Added 'Add Airbnb Income' button, creates green income node labeled 'Airbnb Revenue' with $0 default value, can connect to main status node
Added 'Add Freelance Income' button, creates green income node labeled 'Freelance Work' with $0 default value, supports multiple instances
Added 'Add Rent Expense' button, creates red expense node labeled 'Rent' with $0 default value, distinct red styling

Story Name: Dynamic final edge color by net value
Notes: Implemented edge coloring logic: green for positive net value, red for negative, gray for zero; updates dynamically based on connections
Implemented editable value fields for all nodes, double-click to edit, currency formatting, input validation, values persist during session
